archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Return Product Offering Purchase
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Return one or more purchased product offerings after receipt by the purchasing party.

properties.value: Return Product Offering Purchase returns one or more purchased product offerings after receipt by the purchasing party. Before making a return the purchasing party obtains authorization to make the return. Once the returned offering(s) are received by the appropriate logistics process it will initiate a credit for the returned offering(s).
